reviewText: This DVD is documentary on using a technqiue for identifying and releasing emotional problems by tapping with your fingers on various accupuncture points.  If you are familiar with the Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT), Powertapping is almost identical.  It consists of an interview with Robert Rudelic and a demo of the technique.  I think it could have benefitted from demos of people using the technique to solve problems. At the end of the video, there are short interviews with Oakland Raider football team members who have used the technique successfully.  I purchased it used.
